statements: DELETE FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE id = 1 AND network_status = 'offline';
DELETE FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND network_device = 'Router';
DELETE FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_device LIKE '%Switch%' AND network_status = 'error';
DELETE FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1 AND device_status = true;
DELETE FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = false;
DELETE FROM network_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (SELECT metric_id FROM network_metrics WHERE device_id = 1 AND status_code = 500);
DELETE FROM network_alerts WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Server Room A');
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '3 days';
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND data_usage > 1000;
DELETE FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND created_at < '2022-03-01 00:00:00';
